channel.title: SWS: Republic Rifles
channel.description:
**SWS: Republic Rifles** ![](upload://122tOzbVSd9MXT9nTYz2AyZxho1.jpeg)
November Star Wars Saturdays will explore the lives of New Republic soldiers as they fight against the remnants of The Empire to liberate the galaxy!
In **Republic Rifles** , you play as soldiers from the New Republic Expeditionary Force struggling to survive the horrors of trench warfare. Sent to alien worlds, your characters will make personal sacrifices in the name of the New Republic.
We'll be using a reskin of *Ross Rifles* for this series.
-----------------------------------
This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series. The time setting is *after* the end of Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that's *Return of the Jedi* ) when the Empire is falling and the Alliance to Restore the Republic is taking control in fits and starts.
Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries and added to our wiki (https://starwarssaturdays.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page).
**CW: Violence, Imperial power abuse, themes of horror. Strong emotional ties.** **System** : *Powered by the Apocalypse* **Duration** : Four 3 hour sessions **Breaks** : 1 mid-point break per session (10 mins) **Venue** : GM’s Zoom **Recording** : Yes, but made public only if consent by all the players **Attendance** : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players.This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
[date=2020-11-07 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-11-07 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGFKlE4rtqX_ax_9-ml) [date=2020-11-14 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-11-14 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGFKmRM1neS8cOJCOXO) [date=2020-11-21 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-11-21 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGFKomDFAz5TaQVMr5J) [date=2020-11-28 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-11-28 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGFKq0VcfB5vpOtjs5B)

item.title: SWS: Republic Rifles
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

SWS: Republic Rifles

832×554 97.9 KB

November Star Wars Saturdays will explore the lives of New Republic soldiers as they fight against the remnants of The Empire to liberate the galaxy!

In Republic Rifles , you play as soldiers from the New Republic Expeditionary Force struggling to survive the horrors of trench warfare. Sent to alien worlds, your characters will make personal sacrifices in the name of the New Republic.

We’ll be using a reskin of Ross Rifles for this series.

This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series. The time setting is after the end of Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that’s Return of the Jedi ) when the Empire is falling and the Alliance to Restore the Republic is taking control in fits and starts.

Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries and added to our wiki (https://starwarssaturdays.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page).

CW: Violence, Imperial power abuse, themes of horror. Strong emotional ties.
System : Powered by the Apocalypse
Duration : Four 3 hour sessions
Breaks : 1 mid-point break per session (10 mins)
Venue : GM’s Zoom
Recording : Yes, but made public only if consent by all the players
Attendance : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
Safety : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players.This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.

Saturday, November 7, 2020 3:00 PM → Saturday, November 7, 2020 6:00 PM Session 1
Saturday, November 14, 2020 3:00 PM → Saturday, November 14, 2020 6:00 PM Session 2
Saturday, November 21, 2020 3:00 PM → Saturday, November 21, 2020 6:00 PM Session 3
Saturday, November 28, 2020 3:00 PM → Saturday, November 28, 2020 6:00 PM Session 4
